alert.note: Alert for Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 06 at 3:12PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Palm Beach County through 345 PM EST... At 312 PM EST, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Canal Point to near Holey Land Wildlife Refuge. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Beach Gardens, Lion Country Safari Park, The Acreage, Loxahatchee NWR, and Caloosa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
